p: 7. Line 123-125 of page 6, “The obtained powder (1 g) was placed into a 150 mL flask containing 40 mL deionized water, and extracted at 95�C in a water bath for 2 h” was revised as “The treated powder (1 g) was mixed with 40 mL of deionized water in a 150 mL flask, and extracted for 2 h at 95�C”.
